Package com.group13.tmae.controller.tournaments

Class MatchController

java.lang.Object
com.group13.tmae.controller.tournaments.MatchController
@Controller
@RequestMapping("/matches")
public class MatchController
extends java.lang.Object
Controller class for managing match-related actions within a tournament. Provides endpoints for displaying the scoreboard, updating match scores, and completing a match.

    Completes a match by recording the result and determining the winner and loser.

  • Method Details

    • showScoreboard

      @GetMapping("/{matchID}") public java.lang.String showScoreboard​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long matchID, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the scoreboard for a specific match.
      Parameters:
      matchID - The ID of the match to display.
      model - The Spring Model to pass attributes to the view.
      Returns:
      The scoreboard view for the specified match.

    • updateMatch

      @PostMapping("/updateMatch") public java.lang.String updateMatch​(@RequestParam("matchID") java.lang.Long matchID, @RequestParam("athlete1Score") java.lang.Integer athlete1Score, @RequestParam("athlete2Score") java.lang.Integer athlete2Score, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Updates the scores of a match.
      Parameters:
      matchID - The ID of the match to be updated.
      athlete1Score - The new score for athlete 1.
      athlete2Score - The new score for athlete 2.
      redirectAttributes - Attributes for redirect scenarios.
      Returns:
      Redirects to the updated match's scoreboard view.

    • completeMatch

      @PostMapping("/completeMatch") public java.lang.String completeMatch​(@RequestParam("matchID") java.lang.Long matchID, @RequestParam("winner") java.lang.Long winnerID, @RequestParam("athlete1Score") java.lang.Integer athlete1Score, @RequestParam("athlete2Score") java.lang.Integer athlete2Score, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Completes a match by recording the result and determining the winner and loser.
      Parameters:
      matchID - The ID of the match to complete.
      winnerID - The ID of the winning athlete.
      athlete1Score - The score of the first athlete assigned to this match.
      athlete2Score - The score of the second athlete assigned to this match.
      redirectAttributes - Attributes for redirect scenarios.
      Returns:
      Redirects to the tournament view after recording the match result.
